overview.archetype: Arena Nuker / AoE Stun / Single Target Revive

gear_tradeoffs.pros: Ignores DEF for max nuke potential

a1.name: Hellbinder
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. 30% chance to place 60% [Decrease DEF] for 2 turns. Countess Lix will team up if in the same team.

a2.name: Divine Immanence
a2.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Ignores [Increase DEF], [Strengthen], [Ally Protection]. Revives a random ally with 40% HP and places a [Shield] (20% MAX HP) for 2 turns if this attack kills. Also places a [Shield] on self if this attack kills.

a3.name: Light of Sanctity
a3.notes: Removes all buffs from targets under [Veil]/[Perfect Veil], places 25% [Weaken] on those with Veil removed, then attacks all enemies. 75% chance of placing [Stun] on all enemies for 1 turn.

passive.impact: Fills turn meter by 3% every time an ally is hit. Decreases incoming damage by 25% if the attacker's ATK is lower than Astralon's.

booking.notes: A2 and A3 gain significant cooldown reduction and effect chance.

damage_per_turn.a2: Very high (single target, ignores buffs, revive)

rotation.average_damage: High for Arena, moderate for PvE

scenarios.notes: Procs on A2/A3 for maximum nuke potential.
Procs on AoE hits, boosting wave clear and boss damage.

clan_boss.notes: Provides debuffs and control, but not a top CB damage dealer.

synergy.relentless_viability: Low, better in Savage/Cruel for nuking.

investment.notes: Top-tier legendary for Arena and control. Books are a great investment for A2/A3.

owned_comparison.comparison: Synergy for extra attacks and debuffs.
Lydia offers more debuffs, Astralon more control.

draft_logic.notes: Early pick for Arena, counter-pick vs Veil/Perfect Veil teams.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: Can reduce cooldowns for more frequent control.
gear_set_stability.Relentless: Not recommended, as Astralon benefits more from Savage/Cruel.

rotation_desync_risks.Relentless: Medium risk, but less optimal than Savage.

utility_comparison.comparison: Countess Lix offers more debuffs, Astralon more control and damage.
Lydia is more versatile, Astralon is a better nuker.
Arbiter offers more team utility, Astralon more damage.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Helmsmasher for Arena, Warmaster for PvE
final_summary.damage_rotation: A3 for AoE stun, A2 for single target nuke/revive, A1 for DEF Down
final_summary.passive_impact: Frequent turns and damage reduction vs low ATK attackers.
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize ATK%, C.RATE, C.DMG, ACC. Savage/Cruel for Arena.
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Excellent with Countess Lix and other debuffers.

team_setups.name: Arena Control
team_setups.strategy: Open with A3 for AoE stun, Countess Lix for debuffs, Arbiter for speed/revive.

team_setups.name: Doom Tower Waves
team_setups.strategy: Control and debuff waves, revive as needed.
